name: Icon’s 5-IN-1 Minis Collection
description:
5 GAMES-IN-ONE!
Icon’s 5-IN-1 Minis Collection includes Arcade Air Hockey & Bowling™, Arcade Darts™, Bashi Blocks™ and Family Games.
 
ARCADE AIR HOCKEY & BOWLING™
Fully featured 3D versions of Air Hockey & Bowling, with smooth analogue control and realistic gameplay.
 
PSPMinis.com – 9/10 
Family Friendly Gaming – 89%
   
ARCADE DARTS™ 
With authentic darts playing feel, prepare for fun! Control your throws precisely and aim to beat all opponents and become the champion. 
   
PS Focus – 4/5
   
BASHI BLOCKS™ 
With 90 game levels to play through, huge end of zone bosses and several game modes to choose from including customized arcade tournaments, players of all ages are guaranteed hours of endless fun! 
   
PSPMinis.com – 9/10
   
FAMILY GAMES 
The only collection of family friendly games you will ever need! Enjoy absolute classics such as Battleships, Connect 4, Hangman and more, all in one game.
   
Family Friendly Gaming – 89% 
PSPMinis.com – 7.5/10
  
Copyright ©2012 Icon Games Entertainment Ltd.
